text.content:
Unconscious

  • Unconscious creatures are @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.3CQC3JEY2C3Y721F]{Incapacitated}, cannot move or speak, and are unaware of their surroundings.
  • The creature drops whatever it’s holding and falls @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}.
  • The creature automatically fails Strength (Save) and Dexterity (Save) checks.
  • Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
  • Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5ft of the creature.
